io.requery

Annotation Type Column


  • @Documented
 @Target(value={FIELD,METHOD})
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Column
    Indicates a field as being a column in a database table.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String collate 
      ForeignKey[] foreignKey 
      boolean index 
      int length 
      String name 
      boolean unique 
      String value 

    • Element Detail

      • name

        public abstract String name
        Returns:
        Name of the column. If empty then defaults to the field name during table definition.
        Default:
        ""

      • unique

        public abstract boolean unique
        Returns:
        true if this column is uniquely constrained false otherwise.
        Default:
        false

      • index

        public abstract boolean index
        Returns:
        true if this column is indexed false otherwise. Use Index to define the index options.
        Default:
        false

      • length

        public abstract int length
        Returns:
        optional fixed length for the column.
        Default:
        0

      • value

        public abstract String value
        Returns:
        optional default value expression for the column used during table creation. example: 
        
     @Column(value = "now()")
     protected Timestamp timestamp
        Default:
        ""

      • collate

        public abstract String collate
        Returns:
        optional collation type for the column, types varies depending on the platform.
        Default:
        ""

      • foreignKey

        public abstract ForeignKey[] foreignKey
        Returns:
        optional foreign key constraints for this column.
        Default:
        {}
